abstract: While cable channels earned attention in the Emmy drama categories, the comedy performance races remained the dominion of broadcast networks.
snippet: While cable channels earned attention in the Emmy drama categories, the comedy performance races remained the dominion of broadcast networks.
lead_paragraph: While cable channels earned attention in the Emmy drama categories, “the comedy performance races remained the dominion of broadcast networks,” Reuters notes, “with only one actor and one actress from cable making the cut — past winner Tony Shalhoub from USA’s ‘Monk’ and Mary-Louise Parker from ‘Weeds’ on Showtime.”
